column2: In support of his appeal against the said order of the Provincial High

column1: Court, the Appellant now contends before us that;

column2: the  Respondent  acted  in  violation  of  Section  14(1)  of  the
State Lands (Recovery of Possession)  Act No.7 of 1979 by
instituting action before the Magistrate's Court without the
Hon. Minister's prior approval to recover the State land,
